languages.text: {n}У мертвой пророчицы лицо абсолютно непримечательной простолюдинки, усталое и заурядное. Единственная неправильность в ее облике — множество маленьких ртов на щеках и лбу, старательно зашитых толстой нитью и замазанных слоем пудры. Грим превращает лик еретички в жуткую маску, уголок рта застыл в намеке на усмешку, криво повторяемую меньшими ртами. "Ты довол{mf|ен|ьна}, враг мой?" — будто спрашивает эта усмешка.{/n}

{n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}У мертвой пророчицы лицо абсолютно непримечательной простолюдинки, усталое и заурядное. Единственная неправильность в ее облике — множество маленьких ртов на щеках и лбу, старательно зашитых толстой нитью и замазанных слоем пудры. Грим превращает лик еретички в жуткую маску, уголок рта застыл в намеке на усмешку, криво повторяемую меньшими ртами. "Ты довол{mf|ен|ьна}, враг мой?" — будто спрашивает эта усмешка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The only irregularity in her appearance are the many tiny mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The mascara transforms the heretic's face into an uncanny mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly repeated by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, O enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die tote Prophetin hat das müde, nicht weiter bemerkenswerte Gesicht einer völlig unscheinbaren Bürgerin. Das einzig Ungewöhnliche an ihrer Erscheinung sind die vielen kleinen Münder auf ihren Wangen und ihrer Stirn. Sie wurden sorgfältig mit einem dicken Faden zugenäht und mit Gesichtspuder übertönt. Die Kosmetik verwandelt das Gesicht der Ketzerin in eine unheimliche Maske. Ihre Mundwinkel sind zum Anflug eines Grinsens eingefroren, das von ihren kleineren Mündern ironisch gespiegelt wird. "Seid Ihr zufrieden, o {mf|mein Feind|meine Feindin}?", scheint das Grinsen zu fragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die tote Prophetin hat das müde, nicht weiter bemerkenswerte Gesicht einer völlig unscheinbaren Bürgerin. Das einzig Ungewöhnliche an ihrer Erscheinung sind die vielen kleinen Münder auf ihren Wangen und ihrer Stirn. Sie wurden sorgfältig mit einem dicken Faden zugenäht und mit Gesichtspuder übertönt. Die Kosmetik verwandelt das Gesicht der Ketzerin in eine unheimliche Maske. Ihre Mundwinkel sind zum Anflug eines Grinsens eingefroren, das von ihren kleineren Mündern ironisch gespiegelt wird. "Seid Ihr zufrieden, o {mf|mein Feind|meine Feindin}?", scheint das Grinsen zu fragen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prophétesse morte a le visage fatigué et banal d'une roturière tout à fait ordinaire. La seule aberration dans son apparence est la présence de nombreuses petites bouches sur ses joues et son front. Elles ont été soigneusement cousues avec un fil épais et recouvertes d'une couche de poudre pour le visage. Ce produit cosmétique transforme le visage de l'hérétique en un masque sinistre. Les commissures de sa bouche sont figées en un rictus étrange, reflété de façon ironique par ses bouches miniatures. « Êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ? » semblent-elles toutes demander.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prophétesse morte a le visage fatigué et banal d'une roturière tout à fait ordinaire. La seule aberration dans son apparence est la présence de nombreuses petites bouches sur ses joues et son front. Elles ont été soigneusement cousues avec un fil épais et recouvertes d'une couche de poudre pour le visage. Ce produit cosmétique transforme le visage de l'hérétique en un masque sinistre. Les commissures de sa bouche sont figées en un rictus étrange, reflété de façon ironique par ses bouches miniatures. « Êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, ô mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ? » semblent-elles toutes demander.{/n}

languages.text: {n}死去的先知看起来平淡无奇，脸上满是疲惫，看起来就像个完全不起眼的平民一样。她的脸颊与前额上原本长着许多张小嘴，而现在，这些小嘴都已经同粗线小心翼翼地缝好，上面敷了一层扑面粉。此刻，这个异端分子的脸看起来更像是某种怪异的面具。她的嘴角似乎挂着一丝笑容，在那些小嘴的映衬之下，似乎带着一丝挖苦的意味，就像是在问：“你满意了吗？噢，我的仇敌？”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死去的先知看起来平淡无奇，脸上满是疲惫，看起来就像个完全不起眼的平民一样。她的脸颊与前额上原本长着许多张小嘴，而现在，这些小嘴都已经同粗线小心翼翼地缝好，上面敷了一层扑面粉。此刻，这个异端分子的脸看起来更像是某种怪异的面具。她的嘴角似乎挂着一丝笑容，在那些小嘴的映衬之下，似乎带着一丝挖苦的意味，就像是在问：“你满意了吗？噢，我的仇敌？”{/n}

languages.text: {n}預言者の死体は、疲れて地味な、どこも特徴のない一般市民の顔をしていた。外見にひとつ異常なところがあるとすれば、頬と額のあちこちにある小さな口である。それは太い糸で入念に縫い付けられて、フェイスパウダーを何度も重ねて塗りつぶされてる。その化粧のせいで、異端者の顔は不気味な仮面に変貌する。女の口の端はほのかに微笑んで固まり、その少さな口達も歪んだよく似た形をしていた。まるで「我が敵よ、満足か？」と、ニヤリと笑って訊ねているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}預言者の死体は、疲れて地味などこも特徴のない平民の顔をしていた。外見にひとつ異常なところがあるとすれば、頬と額のあちこちにある小さな口である。それは太い糸で入念に縫い付けられて、フェイスパウダーを何度も重ねて塗りつぶされてる。その化粧のせいで、異端者の顔は不気味な仮面に変貌する。女の口の端はほのかに微笑んで固まり、その少さな口達も歪んだよく似た形をしていた。まるで「我が敵よ、満足か？」と、ニヤリと笑って訊ねているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La profeta muerta tiene el rostro cansado y corriente de un plebeyo totalmente común. La única aberración de su aspecto son las numerosas bocas pequeñas que tiene en las mejillas y la frente. Se han cosido minuciosamente con un hilo grueso y se han cubierto con una capa de polvos faciales. Los cosméticos transforman el rostro del hereje en una máscara espeluznante. La comisura de su boca se congela en un atisbo de sonrisa, reflejada irónicamente por sus bocas menores. «¿Estás content{mf|o|a}, enemig{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}?» parece preguntar la mueca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La profeta muerta tiene el rostro cansado y corriente de un plebeyo totalmente común. La única aberración de su aspecto son las numerosas bocas pequeñas que tiene en las mejillas y la frente. Se han cosido minuciosamente con un hilo grueso y se han cubierto con una capa de polvos faciales. Los cosméticos transforman el rostro del hereje en una máscara espeluznante. La comisura de su boca se congela en un atisbo de sonrisa, reflejada irónicamente por sus bocas menores. «¿Estás content{mf|o|a}, oh, enemig{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}?» parece preguntar la mueca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölü peygamber, alt tabakadan alelade birinin bitkin yüzüne sahip. Görünüşündeki tek anormallik, yanağındaki ve alnındaki çok sayıdaki minik ağızlar. Bunlar kalın bir iple dikilip sıkıca kapatılmış ve yüz pudrasıyla gizlenmeye çalışılmış. Yüz makyajı, kâfirin suratını ürpertici bir maskeye dönüştürmüş. Dudaklarının kenarı sırıtmayı andıran şekilde kıvrılı kalmış, küçük ağızlarsa onu taklit edercesine çarpılmış. Bu sırıtış, "Muradına erdin mi düşmanım?" diye sorar gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dead prophet has the weary, unremarkable face of an utterly nondescript commoner. The one aberration of her appearance is the many small mouths on her cheeks and forehead. They have been painstakingly sewn shut with a thick thread and plastered over with a layer of face powder. The cosmetics transform the heretic's face into an eerie mask. The corner of her mouth is frozen in a hint of a grin, wryly mirrored by her lesser mouths. "Are you pleased, enemy mine?" the grin seems to ask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ölü peygamberin siması, sıradan bir köylünün bitkin yüzünü andırıyor. Görünüşündeki tek anormallik, yanağındaki ve alnındaki minik ağızlar. Bunlar, kalın bir iple dikilip sıkıca kapatılmış ve yüz pudrasıyla gizlenmeye çalışılmış. Yüz makyajı, kâfirin suratını âdeta ürpertici bir maskeye dönüştürmüş. Dudaklarının kenarı; sırıtmayı andıran şekilde kıvrılı kalmış, küçük ağızlarsa benzer bir şekilde çarpıkça kıvrılmış. Bu sırıtma, "Muradına erdin mi yegâne düşmanım?" diye sorar gibi duruyor.{/n}
